metadata.title: CVE-2019-14459 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: nfdump 1.6.17 and earlier is affected by an integer overflow in thefunction Process_ipfix_template_withdraw in ipfix.c that can be abused inorder to crash the process remotely (denial of service).

criterions.comment: nfdump: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
